Title: Beyond Our Control
Plot: When an artifact meant for the Warehouse turns up in the small town next door, the team finds themselves in the middle of a B-movie meltdown complete with cowboys, gladiators, sci-fi robots and beach storming marines. Their only chance of survival rests with the man who invented television, Philo T. Farnsworth.
GuestStars: Paula Garces, Nolan Gerard Funk, Mark A. Sheppard, Philip Winchester, CCH Pounder
